sect1.title: SUCCESS
sect1.para: attribute := expression : SUCCESS SUCCESS (handler) SUCCESS workflow service ;

row.entry: The action to run if the expression succeeds.

sect1.para: The SUCCESS service executes the handler Attribute when the expression succeeds. SUCCESS notionally executes in parallel with the successful return of the result. This service implicitly causes the attribute to be evaluated at global scope instead of the enclosing scope. Only available if workflow services are turned on (see #OPTION(workflow)).
